title: What are the best bands with more than one lead vocalist? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Best Bands that have more than one lead Vocalists, in my opinion, are: The B-52s  This band features a line-up of a Drummer, a Guitarist (who only plays with 4 strings) and three Vocalists. The Three Vocalists, Fred Schneider, Cindy Wilson and Kate Pierson, all sang solos on their hit song “Love Shack”, while one of them usually performs the lead vocals on other songs such as Fred on “Rock Lobster”. The Beach Boys  In spite of this band going through multiple line-up changes over it’s 55 years in existence, all of the members have sung lead vocals on at least one of the songs attributed to this group. While Mike Love sang the lead vocals on most of their hit songs, brothers Brian & Carl Wilson sung lead on the ballad “God Only Knows” while their brother Dennis Wilson and fellow member Al Jardine sang lead on other, more upbeat tunes. The Beatles  While either John Lennon and / or Paul McCartney performed Lead Vocals on most of their recordings, lead guitarist George Harrison contributed vocal solos on songs such as “Something” and “While My Guitar Gently Weeps”, while drummer Ringo Starr performed lead vocal duties on songs such as “Yellow Submarine”. Fleetwood Mac  While this band has also gone through multiple line-up changes during it’s 45–50 year existence, there have also been multiple band members who have took turns singing lead vocals, such as Stevie Nicks, guitarist Lindsay Buckingham and keyboardist Christine McVie. Lady Antebellum  Most of the band’s songs, including their signature song “Need You Now”, features lead vocals sung by both Hilary Scott and Charles Kelley. While Hilary & Charles usually sing in a duet on most of those songs, there are a few songs that only feature lead vocals from either Hilary or Charles. The Temptations  This Five-man Boy Band’s Line-Up has consistently changed over their almost six decades in existence. In spite of that, however, pretty much all the members of the band would sing lead vocals. Some, such as David Ruffin, Eddie Kendricks & Dennis Edwards, were primarily lead singers while others sang lead on very few songs. Sources: 7 Bands With More Than One Lead Singer: The B-52's, Fleetwood Mac, And More Strength In Numbers: 14 Classic Rock Bands With More Than One Lead Singer Vocal Tag Team - TV Tropes Top 10 Lady Antebellum Songs The Temptations - Wikipedia
